data.title: Parking Team of the Year: Derby City Council
data.meta_description: Derby City Council has established a group of specialised teams to deliver a range of traffic and parking management services. The team is led by Rob Shoebridge
data.text:

Parking Team of the Year: Derby City Council

British Parking Awards 2021

Derby City Council assemble! Laura Jaussali, Kerry Griffiths, Samantha Buckley, Leon Buxton, Marcus Dalby, Christopher Hodgkins, Daniel Reed, Julie Warner, Rob Shoebridge, Lewis Dodd and Louis Wilson

Derby City Council has established a group of specialised teams to deliver a range of traffic and parking management services. The team is led by Rob Shoebridge, traffic and transportation group manager, who says: “The Parking Services team at Derby City Council is made up of several dedicated mini-teams that focus their time and expertise in specialist areas allowing for an efficient and productive operation.

“Over the 18 months, I have spearheaded a huge transformation of our...
